titleStmt.title: Von Ludwig Wittgenstein an John Maynard Keynes, 12. 6. 1919
titleStmt.author: Wittgenstein, Ludwig

sourceDesc.p: Original an der King's College Library in Cambridge; Kopie im BA. Publiziert (Letters, S. 112; deutsch: Briefe, S. 86; Cambridge Letters, S. 114; WiC, S. 91).

list.item: 2007/06: Conversion from Folio Flat File to XML

div.p: Please kindly forward the enclosed letter to Russells address. I wish I could see him somehow or other, for I am sure he won't be able to understand my book without a very thorough explanation, which cann't be written. Have you done any more work on probability? My M.S. contains a few lines about it which, I believe, â€’ solve the essential question.
